DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Proactive Telephone Counseling Pregnant Smokers Enrolled Managed Care Organization
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize control trial compare efficacy proactive pregnancy-tailored telephone-delivered smoking cessation counsel program “ best practice ” brief counsel control condition among pregnant woman refer prenatal care provider manage care plan Massachusetts . Intervention group patient receive 105 min cognitive-behavioral counseling deliver motivational interviewing style train counselor throughout pregnancy 2 month postpartum . Control group patient receive 5 minute brief counsel 1 telephone call . All participant mail write self-help smoking cessation material tailor pregnancy . The primary outcome measure cotinine-validated tobacco abstinence end pregnancy . Secondary outcome cotinine-validated abstinence 3 month postpartum self-reported significant ( > 50 % ) reduction daily cigarette use .
